title: Golden Milk (Haldi Doodh)
description: The classic immunity booster for cold nights and healing.
preparation: Heat 1 cup of milk just before boiling.
Add a pinch of black pepper (crucial for absorption).
tradition: Balances Vata and Kapha doshas. Known as 'Ojas' building (vitality). Warming potency.
science: Curcumin in turmeric reduces inflammatory cytokines. Piperine in black pepper increases curcumin absorption by 2000%.

title: Ginger Lemon Tea
description: A zesty brew to kickstart digestion and fight nausea.
preparation: Crush 1 inch of fresh ginger root.
Boil in 2 cups of water for 10 minutes.
tradition: Ignites 'Agni' (digestive fire). Clears 'Ama' (toxins) from the gut.
science: Gingerol stimulates saliva and gastric enzymes, speeding up gastric emptying to relieve nausea.

title: Tulsi Steam Inhalation
description: Direct relief for congested sinuses and headaches.
preparation: Boil a large pot of water with 10-15 fresh Tulsi leaves.
Cover head with a towel and inhale steam deeply for 5-10 minutes.
tradition: Clears Prana Vaha Srotas (respiratory channels). Sattvic nature calms the mind.
science: Essential oils like Eugenol in Tulsi allow for mucolytic action (breaking down mucus) and have antimicrobial effects.
